name: Walkies?
description:
In Walkies?, you are not one, but two hyperactive dogs who take the phrase "Walkies?" to a whole new level of madness. Their troublemaking nature says a lot about how little they care for their unfortunate dog walker as they pull him along on their adrenaline-filled adventure, or what most owners would call a "daily walk".

Can you rampage through the neighbourhood while keeping control over the two dogs?
